title: Short-Term Professional Development Course for Educational Administrators Using Twitter

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Simulation-based training for corporate language education administrators. Recreates actual Twitter usage cases in VR to provide a safe practice environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three professional networking strategies with peer administrators using the Twitter platform.
Learners can identify at least five useful information sources through hashtag analysis related to educational management.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans based on Twitter and implement them in VR simulations.
Learners can write at least three professional communication messages based on an understanding of online community norms.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
